mdRecord.dcterms:description: Consists of general t.-p. and four pamphlets, each with special t.-p., as follows: [no. 1] The relation of the state to the city school system ... comp. and analyzed by the Public School League of Buffalo, Frederick E. Shapleigh, research secretary.--[no. 2.] Government of the city of Rochester, N.Y., description of organization and functions ... prepared for the Rochester Bureau of Municipal Research by the New York Bureau of Municipal Research.--[no. 3] Government of Monroe County, N.Y. (including town government) ... --[no.4] Government of Nassau County ... prepared for the Commission on the Government of Nassau County by the New York Bureau of Municipal Research.
